description:
I have gained experience by designing, developing, maintaining, and deploying healthcare software.

Technologies I Use >
- Svelte for building reactive and modern user interfaces
- Typescript for ensuring type safety and enhancing code quality.
- Tailwind CSS for efficient and customizable styling.
- Redis for fast caching and improving application performance.
- Spring Boot for robust back-end development.
- PostgreSQL for reliable database management.

Project Leader of Group 6 Balikpapan Section on Studi Independen - Kampus Merdeka program by Ministry of Education.

There are two projects I led, Clo an E-Commerce Website Project and Shopping Cart Database Analysis a Data Analytics Project.
